macpan2

Source: R/macpan2.R
macpan2-package.Rd

This R package is a do-over of the McMasterPandemic package on compartmental epidemic modelling for forecasting and analysis of infectious diseases.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://canmod.github.io/macpan2/

  • https://github.com/canmod/macpan2

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/canmod/macpan2/issues
